column2: waittowearoff, 35-44 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I have a cough that resulted from what I believe to be flu. I was hacking every 30 seconds or so, making it difficult to get any rest. I had heard of cough syrup with codeine, and thought this might be a good solution. I was disappointed after taking Iophen-C NR and it made no apparent reduction in hacking, if anything it seemed to make my coughing more frequent and worse. With continuous hacking, I was also not able to get any rest, the whole reason to visit the Dr and get medication. After looking around on the web, I noticed that this medication (Iophen-C NR) is a mixture of an expectorant and codeine, a combination that makes no sense to me - increase the flow of mucus and try to relax - how is that supposed to work?  Shouldn't a medication either decrease the flow and try to relax OR increase the flow and get hyper for some good hacking? Suppressant with codeine OR expectorant with cocaine - now that would make sense.Looking on this list of comments, it would appear this useless product has other satisfied customers like me. Hopefully you're reading this before taking a dose - I'm waiting for my dose to wear off so I can take an antihistamine and get some rest instead of the coughing aerobics I've got going on now.
